mapper.sql: id, create_time, last_update, visibility, shop_id, goods_id, sale_count, quantity
mapper.insert: insert into tb_shop_goods_relation (id, create_time, last_update, visibility, shop_id, goods_id, sale_count, quantity) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{visibility,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{saleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into tb_shop_goods_relation
id, create_time, last_update, visibility, shop_id, goods_id, sale_count, quantity,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{visibility,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{saleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update tb_shop_goods_relation
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_update = #{lastUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
visibility = #{visibility,jdbcType=TINYINT},
shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sale_count = #{saleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_shop_goods_relation set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_update = #{lastUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, visibility = #{visibility,jdbcType=TINYINT}, shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sale_count = #{saleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select s.id,s.image,s.name,s.sale_count,sgr.goods_id,g.price,gi.url from tb_shop_goods_relation as sgr left join tb_shop as s on sgr.shop_id=s.id left join tb_goods as g on sgr.goods_id=g.id left join tb_goods_image as gi on sgr.goods_id=gi.goods_id where s.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') and gi.position=1

select g.id,g.name,g.sale_count,g.weight,g.price,gi.url,sgr.shop_id,s.adress,s.telephone from tb_shop_goods_relation as sgr left join tb_shop as s on sgr.shop_id=s.id left join tb_goods as g on sgr.goods_id=g.id left join tb_goods_image as gi on sgr.goods_id=gi.goods_id where g.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') and gi.position=1

select g.id,g.name,g.sale_count,g.weight,g.price,gi.url,sgr.shop_id,s.adress,s.telephone from tb_shop_goods_relation as sgr left join tb_shop as s on sgr.shop_id=s.id left join tb_goods as g on sgr.goods_id=g.id left join tb_goods_image as gi on sgr.goods_id=gi.goods_id where gi.position=1

select g.id,g.name,g.sale_count,g.weight,g.price,gi.url,sgr.shop_id,s.adress,s.telephone from tb_shop_goods_relation as sgr left join tb_shop as s on sgr.shop_id=s.id left join tb_goods as g on sgr.goods_id=g.id left join tb_goods_image as gi on sgr.goods_id=gi.goods_id where gi.position=1 and g.price between 0 and 1000
